MetalShield.NAME: Metal Shield
MetalShield.FLAVOR: Running back into your own little time again, huh? That's a bad habit of yours.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click :Consume 6 charge, the next card you play costs 0 this turn.(gain 1 charge at the start of your turn, up to 12) NL Gain 2 Potion slots.

Mami.NAME: Mami's Head
Mami.FLAVOR: There's nothing to be afraid of...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, you have 10% chance to gain 1 #rVulnerable.

BlackLongbow.NAME: Black Longbow
BlackLongbow.FLAVOR: Sadness and hatred are constantly staged in this hopeless world.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rMetal #rShield. At the start of your turn random trigger a effects: NL Gain [E] . NL Random enemy lose 1 Strength. NL Remove a random buff from enemy.

SoulGem_Demon.NAME: Demon SoulGem
SoulGem_Demon.FLAVOR: What is hotter than hope and deeper than despair is love!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rMetal #rShield. The first time you play Servant card each turn, gain [E] . NL When you draw Servant card, draw 1 card. NL Whenever you draw #rCurse, exhaust it, At the end of your turn add same amount Servant card you don't have into the discard pile.
